item.description: On the internet, the truth and the manufactured lies about celebrities are hard to sort through.

item.title: How A.I. Could Reshape the Economic Geography of America
item.description: As the technology is widely adopted, some once-struggling midsize cities in the Midwest, Mid-Atlantic and South may benefit, new research predicts.
